name: Martin Luther King, Jr. Beacon Community School
description: Ensures college readiness for youth through an extended learning program. Allows youth to build community connections and excel academically through enrichment and recreation opportunities and homework support.
fullDescription: Ensures college readiness for youth through an extended learning program. Allows youth to build community connections and excel academically through enrichment and recreation opportunities and homework support.
whatTheyOffer: Ensures college readiness for youth through an extended learning program. Allows youth to build community connections and excel academically through enrichment and recreation opportunities and homework support.
howToGetIt: To apply, please fill out the registration form on https://mlkbeacon.wixsite.com/program/register-now.
agency: YMCA of San Francisco - Bayview Hunters Point
